title: Cremet pasta med asparges

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '250 g frisk pasta' is best matched with 'frisk pasta, fettucine spinat' because it is the most specific and least processed option available for fresh pasta. While 'pasta' is a broader category, 'frisk pasta, fettucine spinat' is a more precise match for 'frisk pasta' and has a lower emission factor than 'fyldt frisk pasta', making it a more realistic and conservative estimate.

The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' is best matched with 'hvidløg' as it is the most direct and least processed form of garlic available. Other options like 'hvidløg i olie' or 'hvidløgsbaguette, frost' involve additional processing or are part of a prepared dish, which would not accurately reflect the emissions of raw garlic.

The ingredient '1 løg' is best matched with 'løg' as it is the most direct and least processed form of onion available. Options like 'løg, ristede' or 'løg, hakkede, dybfrost' involve additional processing, and 'rødløg' is a specific type of onion, making 'løg' the most appropriate general match for a single onion.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: 1 bundt asparges = 500 g, 1 * 500 g = 500 g = 0.5 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 bdt grønne asparges' is best matched with 'asparges, grøn' as it is the most direct and least processed form of green asparagus available. Other options like 'grønne bønner' or 'grønne ærter' are different vegetables, and 'grønne bønner, haricots verts, frost' is a processed form of a different vegetable.

The ingredient '1 squash' is best matched with 'squash' as it is the most direct and least processed form of squash available. Other options like 'avocado' or 'aubergine' are different vegetables, and 'rasp' is a processed food item.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Håndfuld krydderurter (basilikum, oregano osv.) = 0.025 kg, 1 * 0.025 kg = 0.025 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 stor håndfuld frisk basilikum' is best matched with 'basilikum, frisk' as it directly specifies 'frisk basilikum', making it the most accurate and least processed option. 'Basilikum, tørret' is a processed form, and 'persille' and 'pesto' are different ingredients or prepared products.

The ingredient '2 dl fløde' is best matched with 'fløde 38 %, piskefløde' as it is the most direct and least processed form of cream available. 'Flødeis' and 'likør, kaffe med fløde' are processed products, and 'flødeost, ost 60+' is a different dairy product.

The ingredient '1 dl vand' is best matched with 'vand, postevand' as it is the most direct and least processed form of water available. Other options like 'vandmelon', 'tun i vand, konserves', or 'sild' are completely different food items.

The ingredient '6 spsk revet parmesan' is best matched with 'parmesan ost, 32+' as it is the most direct and least processed form of parmesan cheese available. 'Vegansk ost, revet eller skiver' is a different type of cheese, and 'fyldt frisk pasta' and 'brie, ost 45+' are different food items.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af ingrediens ikke angivet, LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.05 kg, 2 portioner * 0.05 kg = 0.1 kg

While 'rapsolie' and 'solsikkeolie' are also oils, 'olivenolie' is a widely used cooking oil, and 'oliven tapenade' is a prepared product.

instructions:
Sæt en gryde over med vand til pastaen. Kog det efter anvisning på pakken og hæld vandet fra så det ikke tilberedes yderligere.
Knæk enderne af de grønne asparges (enderne kan ikke spises). Skær dem i ca. 1 cm lange stykker.
Svits løg og hvidløg i olie på en varm pande. Tilsæt squash og asparges og svits det yderligere et par minutter, drys med en knsp salt og lidt peber.
Kom så vandet på panden og smuldrer bouillonterningen på så den hurtigere opløses. Hæld fløden på sammen med revet parmesan og vend det hele godt rundt.
Vend den friske pasta i blandingen og tilsidst mozzarella og frisk basilikum. Smag til om retten evt kan bruuge lidt ekstra kværnet peber. Velbekomme!
